name: Move along
description:
move along is a game where you control everyone but not the hero of the game.

this is my second gamejam ever so sorry if its not perfect.

you move all of them at the same time and make them fire at the same time

had no time to make a tutorial so here is a quick one

the ninja attacks the nearest defender and you control there rotation by rotating the mouse around the ninja .

they all at the same time with left mouse click.

every time a defender dies the damage coast increases your goal is to kill the ninja with damage coast less than $15k .

the box can make you lose or earn money , test your luck
